snippet: Some hard-line conservatives still distressed over the re-election of President Obama have made their displeasure known by hanging upside-down American flags in their yard.
abstract: Some hard-line conservatives still distressed over Pres Obama's re-election have made their displeasure known by hanging upside-down American flags in their yard, military signal for dire distress; critics say flags are disrespectful.
lead_paragraph: Some hard-line conservatives still distressed over the re-election of President Obama have made their displeasure known by hanging upside-down American flags in their yard.

headline.seo: Upside-Down Flags Mark Conservative Anger Over Obama
headline.main: Symbol of Pride, Inverted, Is Now Symbol of Political Dismay
headline.print_headline: Symbol of Pride, Inverted, Is Now Symbol of Political Dismay
